PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Please refer to the guide at forums - https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/2866127 ^xec89f5Discord Link: ^x71d6fa https://discord.gg/nqG2kPhVNM ^7 Do remember to read the QnA section of the guide if you encountered any issues.
If the issue is not stated by the guide, you can reach me personally on my discord or official Path of Exile discord, both links are in the foreword of the guide section. ^6Please do not PM me in game or any other sorts of private messages, I would likely ignore it ^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________
!!! PLEASE READ !!!
^x71d6faNOTE: I personally don't recommend ultra investing into the build as it has lost too much survivability compared to before.
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________
^x27e3a6Quiill Rain ^7-> ^x27e3a6-Mana cost rings ^7-> ^x27e3a66-linked chest piece ^7-> ^x27e3a6Lvl 21 Toxic Rain -> ^x27e3a6Poacher's Mark ^7-> ^x27e3a66l +1 curse chest / 6l bow ^7-> ^x27e3a6Despair on hit gloves ^7vvv
^x27e3a6+1 Chaos amulet ^7-> ^x27e3a6Cluster jewels ^7-> ^x27e3a6Immortal call setup ^7 -> ^x27e3a6Increased cooldown recovery belt ^7-> ^x27e3a6Slow incremental upgrades on gear, refer to the guide
^5^3^2It can be endgame +3 bow, -9 chaos res helmet, better quiver etc
^6NOTE: ^7To fix mana issues, you can use these options below ^5^4- Mana gain on hit jewels - Self cast poachers on bosses - -mana cost rings & amulet - replica conqueror efficacy / regular conqueror efficacy
^7To fix mana issues on clear, you just need mana gain on kill.
^5For attribute issues: ^5^5^7You should not have huge attribute issues if you level your gems appropriately. These are the gems that may hinder your attribute requirements > ^1Enduring cry ^7> ^1Immortal call ^7> ^6Wither ^7> ^6Flame Dash ^7> ^6Clarity
^1^7Don't level these gems to very high level if you are restrcited by your attributes, just leave them be. ^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________
^xec89f5FAQ ^xe6acd1Q: Why no ballista ^x71d6faA: I personally dislike the clunky playstyle of ballistas. Wither totems have a better wither application compared to ballista setup
^xe6acd1Q: Which ascendancy I should go? ^x71d6faA: For softcore, Deadeye, because she gives a lot more speed compared to raider and the highest dps output ascendancy For HC, Champion for the tank
^xe6acd1Q: How to configure PoB ^x71d6faA: Set boss to Sirus, Overlaps to 4-5 (4 recommended), wither stacks to 10-15. Galeforce to 6-10 If you have Torrent's, enable Slipstream If you have Sources of frenzy generation, enable frenzy
For the reason to put 5 overlaps, please watch this explanation video https://youtu.be/ww3Rfi2Yq4Q ^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89f5 Keywords > DC = Disconnect (Or use Portal Scroll to go back to town) > WP = waypoint > MS = Movement speed > ID = Identifiy (with scroll of wisdom)
This leveling method works for me, it might not be the most efficient method, but if you have no clue on how to level with this build, this is the method that works the best for you. ^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 1 = Walkthrough ^x71d6fc [] Hillock [] Get Caustic Arrow (link to Pierce) [] Check for MS boots and G=G=G if nothing get iron ring if possible [] Coast (Click on impaled bodies if possible, look for Iron rings) [] Mud Flats [] Submerged Passage (Get WP) [] WP to Coast [] Tidal (from top right, go left) [] DC (make sure to grab portal scrol [] Get Quicksilver + Mirage Archer from reward (link to Caustic, drop Pierce) [] Buy Shrapnel Ballista + Onslaught (link Onslaught to Caustic + Mirage Archer) [] Upgrade Life Flasks whenever possible (sell 3 same life flask to a vendor for an upgraded version) [] Dash + Puncture [] Check MS and G=G=G (G=G=G is links and socket colors) [] Submerged Passage [] Portal at bridge (The bridge that leads you to an elevated cliff) [] The Ledge [] Get WP [] Prison -> WP to town -> Take Portal in town to Submerged [] Flooded Depths [] Kill Dweller then DC [] Get Void Manipulation from reward (Link it to Caustic) [] Buy War Banner, doesn't need to be linked [] Buy 2nd Void Manipulation (level it offhand) [] Start to ID rares to vendor for Alteration shards [] Lower Prison [] Complete the Trial of Ascendancy [] Brutus (follow blood in upper prison) [] DC [] Buy iron rings if needed [] Grab Witering Step [] WP to Prisoner's Gate [] Narrow path to Ship Graveyard [] Look for WP or Cave. If can't find WP, drop Portal and go up towards Cave. [] Cavern -> WP to town -> Take portal to Ship Graveyard [] Fairgraves [] DC [] Get Toxic Rain from reward [] Toxic Rain + Void Manipulation + Mirage(the 2nd void manipulation earlier), drop Shrapnel Ballista, Put Void Manipulation into TR [] WP to Merveil's Cavern [] Merveil ^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 2 = ^x27e3ac Current Links - Toxic Rain + Void Manipulation + Mirage Archer - Caustic Arrow + Void Manipulation + Onslaught - Dash + Withering Step - War Banner
Goals - Don't overdo toxic rain, tap and go - Press withering step on tough enemies to apply wither stacks (increased damage taken for enemies) - Look for Essences - 2 Quicksilver ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Old Fields [] TP Outside Den (If no 2nd Quicksilver) [] Crossroads WP -> WP to town -> Portal to Old Fields [] Den (always go top except one that loops) [] DC [] Get Quicksilver [] WP to Crossroads [] Chamber of Sins [] Complete the Trial of Ascendancy [] Kill Fidelitas/ Save Helena [] DC [] Grab Blood Rage + Skitterbots [] Riverways (follow road to WP) then continue to Western Forest [] Follow road get WP [] Follow spiderwebs to Weaver's Chambers [] Kill Weaver (~lvl 16) [] DC [] WP to Crossroads [] Follow road to Broken Bridge [] Kill Kraityn [] DC [] WP to Riverways [] Wetlands [] Kill Oak [] Find Roots/ get WP [] WP to Western Forest [] Kill Alira (could help Alira on league start) [] Follow road south to kill Blackguard [] DC [] Get Vicious Projectiles reward (link to Toxic Rain, Toxic Rain = Void Mani = Vicious Proj) [] WP to Act 1 Town for Bestel reward [] WP to Crossroads [] Fellshrine Ruins [] The Crypt Trial [] DC [] WP to Wetlands [] Clear roots -> Vaal Ruins [] WP [] Ancient Seal [] Northern Forest [] Cavern [] Ancient Pyramid [] Kill Oversoul [] DC [] WP Act 3
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 3 = ^x27e3ac Tips - 4-links start at lvl 24
Current Links - Toxic Rain + Void Manipulation / Vicious Projectiles + Mirage - Caustic Arrow + Void + Onslaught (Or Vicious) - War Banner - Skitterbots - Blood Rage
Goals - Despair - remember to use it on high HP mobs/bosses - 4 Link green - 3 link Royal / Short / Thicket Bow (attack speed, preferably 1.5 APS) ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Save Clarissa (talk to her) [] Go to Slums [] Crematorium [] Get WP [] Complete the Trial of Ascendancy [] Tolman quest [] DC [] Clarissa [] Maramoa reward Despair (Doesn't need to be linked) [] Slums -> Sewers [] Busts [] WP [] The Marketplace [] WP [] Catacombs [] Complete the Trial of Ascendancy [] DC [] Hagan reward + passive [] WP to Marketplace -> The Battlefront [] WP [] Ribbon [] Docks (if underleveled, reset zone on WP to keep killing ~half way to 27) [] Quest item [] DC [] WP to Battlefront [] Solaris Temple [] Grab Int amulet reward (Lapis) [] DC [] WP to Sewers [] Ebony Barracks [] WP [] Skip Gravicious (Or you can kill him but he is dangerous and we don't need his quest reward) [] Lunaris Temple [] WP [] Lunaris 2 [] Kill Piety [] DC [] Grigor, Clarissa for rewards [] Busts reward [] Check for 4 link (vendor) [] WP Ebony Barracks [] Imperial Gardens [] Grab WP -> Complete the Trial of Ascendancy [] Library -> Pages [] DC [] Aspirants Plaza -> WP [] WP to Library [] Get Malevolence + Flesh and Stone + Spell Totem + Wither Totem [] Drop War Banner + Skitterbots + Arctic Armor auras and Caustic Arrow Setup [] Link Mirage Archer to Toxic Rain [] WP to Imperial Gardens [] Enter Scepter of God [] Dominus
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 4 = ^x71d6fc^x27e3ac Current Links - Toxic Rain + Void Manipulation + Vicious Projectiles + Mirage Archer - Dash - Skitterbots / Malevolence - Blood Rage - Spell Totem + Wither
Goals - Fixed resists and damage by crafting - Upgraded 3 or 4 link bow - Upgraded flasks ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] The Dried Lake [] Crafting recipe [] DC [] Check vendor again [] Mines [] Mines level 2 [] Deshret's Spirit [] Crystal Veins [] WP [] Daresso's Dream [] DC [] Tasuni Passive Reward [] Kaom's Dream [] DC [] WP to Aspirants Plaza for First Lab (Deadeye -> Gathering Winds / Occupying force) (Pick Occupying force if you want more stable damage, Gathering Winds for extra speed) (Recommended to have 1k hp before doing Trial) [] Belly of the beast [] Piety [] The Harvest [] WP [] Kill Shav, Deodre, Maligaro [] DC [] Check vendor, grove bow [] Fix resists/ damage (crafting) [] Kill Malachai [] DC [] Buy Multiple Totems Support (Link to Spell Totem + Wither) [] The Descent
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 5 = ^x27e3ac Current Links - Toxic Rain + Void Manipulation + Vicious Projectiles + Mirage Archer - Dash - Skitters / Malevolence - Blood Rage - Spell Totem + Wither + Multiple Totems Support
Goals - Flasks with resists or adrenaline - Enough resists for the penalty after kitava ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Escape the slave pens [] Transmute + alt flasks if needed (adrenaline / staunching / etc..) [] Two stone ring reward with most fitting implicit resists [] Control Blocks [] Templar Courts [] Chamber of Innocence [] Kill Innocence [] Torched Courts [] Ruined Square [] WP [] Ossuary [] The Reliquary -> Kitava's Torments [] DC [] Silver Flask reward [] Replace the low ilvl Quicksilver for the Silver flask [] Reset and WP to Ruined Square [] Cathedral Rooftop (~lvl 41) [] Apex [] Kitava
Note: Other non-passive skills quest rewards can be ignored ^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 6 = ^x27e3ac Tips - Use your essences to find potential upgrades
Current Links - same links
Goals - Craft to even out resistances post Kitava - Pantheon - Tukohama - Brine King - Upgrade gear as you find it or by quest rewards - 4 links - Upgrading flasks ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Coast [] WP [] Tidal Islands [] DC [] Bestel [] Choose most needed slot, use alchemy or essence [] Craft missing resistances [] WP to Coast [] Mud flats [] Kill Dishonored Queen [] Karui Fortress [] Defeat Tukohama [] Tukohama Pantheon [] Go north to The Ridge [] Get WP [] Lower Prison -> Trial [] Shavronne's Tower [] Kill Shav + Brutus [] Portal to Town [] Clear Twilight Strand [] DC [] Lilly reward [] Tarkleigh passive and 4link reward [] WP to Prisoner's Gate [] Defeat Abberath [] Western Forest [] Riverways [] WP [] Wetlands [] Puppet Mistress [] DC [] Tarkleigh Passive Reward [] WP to Riverways [] Southern Forest [] Get WP [] Cavern of Anger [] The Beacon [] WP [] Beacon quest [] Brine King's Reef [] Brine King Pantheon [] DC [] Bestel Reward [] WP to Act 7
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 7 = ^x27e3ac Links - same links
Goals - stanching flask for corrupted blood ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Broken Ridge [] Silver Locket [] Crossroads [] Get WP [] Fellshrine Ruins [] The Crypt [] Get WP [] Trial [] Damage over time recipe [] Crypt level 2 [] Get quest item [] DC [] WP to Crossroads [] North East to Chamber of Sins [] Talk to Silk and get WP [] Use map device [] Loop around inner wall [] Maligaro [] Portal [] Talk to Silk [] Chamber of sins level 2 [] Trial [] Den [] Ashen Fields [] Northern Forest [] Leave TP at Dread Thicket [] Causeway [] WP [] Get quest item [] Vaal City [] WP [] WP to town and take portal [] Dread Thicket pick up Fireflies [] Kill Gruthkul [] Pick up remaining Fireflies [] DC [] Turn in quests and get 4link boots, passive points, jade flask [] WP to Vaal City [] Temple of Decay [] Kill Arakaali
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 8 = ^x71d6fc^x27e3ac Links - same links
Goals - Aspirants Trial, 2nd lab ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Stick to the wall [] The Toxic Conduits [] Doedre's Cesspool [] Go to The Quay because of skill point quests [] Stick to the left for the Ankh [] Clarissa & Tolman [] Head to the right towards The Grain Gate [] The Imperial Fields [] Get WP [] Solaris Temple (Follow red carpet) [] Get WP [] Solaris Temple lvl 2 [] Portal [] Kill Dawn [] DC [] Turn in Clarissa quest [] Turn in Maramoa [] Hargan get Two-Stone ring that helps with your lowest resistances [] Aspirants Trial, 2nd lab [] -> Gathering Winds / Occupying Force (Pick the other one, depend on what you picked at the start, if you picked Gathering Winds first then pick Occupying Force and vice versa) [] Solaris Concourse [] The Harbour Bridge [] The Lunaris Concourse [] Get WP [] Lunaris Temple [] Lunaris Temple lvl 2 [] Go to Harbour Bridge (make sure to reset so you can kill on your way to boss)
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 9 = ^x71d6fc^x27e3ac Links - same links
Goals - At least level 60 ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Farm blood aqueducts until level ~57 [] Head to The Descent [] The Vastiri Desert [] Stick to top wall [] The Foothills [] Get WP [] The Boiling Lake [] Kill Basilisk [] DC [] Talk to Sin [] Go to Foothills [] Reach The Tunnel -> Trial [] The Quarry [] Talk to Sin [] Refinery (Going up is the fastest way) [] DC [] Quarry [] Shrine of the Winds [] Kill Garukhan [] Belly of the Beast [] The Rotting Core [] Shavs [] Maligaro [] Doedre [] Black Heart
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________ ^xec89fc = Act 10 = ^x71d6fc^x27e3ac Links - same links
Goals - Kill Kitava! ^x71d6fc Walkthrough
[] Cathedral Rooftop [] Rescue Bannon [] Ravaged Square [] Get WP [] Torched Courts [] Desecrated Chambers [] Kill Avarius [] DC [] Talk to Bannon [] WP to Ravaged Square [] Talk to Innocence [] Kitava
^x97f58c___________________________________________________________________
^x27e3a6x27e3a6 ^x71d6fax71d6fa ^xec89f5xec89f5 ^x97f589x97f589 ^xe6acd1xe6acd1
